LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallNamesColou: Enable the Harmony transpiler for pawn tabs, allowing thrall names to appear purple.
Enable the Harmony transpiler for travel dialogue, allowing thrall names to appear purple.
Injects an additional check into vanilla code, disable if it causes issues. As it's a transpiler, you will need to restart the game for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallResSkillDe:
If enabled, resurrecting a pawn as a thrall will cause the level of all skills to decay, with a 25% chance the level does not decrease at all.

A skill at level 20 will decrease by 5.
A skill at level 10 will decrease by 2.
A skill at level 5 will decrease by 1.
A skill at, or below, level 3 will not decrease at all.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallRotOnDeath: Enable thralls instantly rotting upon death.
This will prevent them from being enthralled again, as you can not enthrall rotten or desiccated corpses.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallDeathOnDow: Enable thralls dying when their master is downed.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallLimitedLif: Enable thralls having a limited lifespan.
This setting is not retroactive. It will only affect newly created thralls.\n\nUse the below slider to set the lifespan of the thralls.
The number of days until a thrall dies.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallCanDesicca: Allow enthralling rotten and desiccated corpses.
Rotten and desiccated corpses WILL NOT remain rotten or desiccated after reanimation.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallIdeoChange: Prevent the Ideology of thralls ever changing.
This prevents the Ideology a thrall follows from ever being changed by any means. They will still automatically join their masters Ideology when enthralled.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallSocialInte: Disable thralls doing certain social interactions.
Disable thralls doing every social interaction.
As this blocks every social interaction, thralls will be unable to warden, or similar jobs.
LanguageData.ESCP_NecromanticThralls_ThrallBloodfeedT: Disable thralls being valid targets for bloodfeed and hemogen extraction.
You my want to toggle the setting for whether thralls can suffer from bloodloss, as otherwise thralls will not recover blood afterwards.
